titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 10th Anniversary of the National Book Festival.
A resolution recognizing the 10th Anniversary of the National Book Festival.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes and emphasizes the important historic and ongoing role of the National Book Festival and encourages the celebration of "A Decade of Words and Wonder" on Saturday, September 25, 2010.
